_set_cos_sin_cache() _set_cos_sin_cachemodeling_deepseek.DeepseekV3YarnRotaryEmbedding modeling_deepseek.DeepseekV3YarnRotaryEmbedding_set_cos_sin_cache
modeling_deepseek.DeepseekV3YarnRotaryEmbedding._set_cos_sin_cache ( self, seq_len, device, dtype)[protected]
Set the cosine and sine cache for positional encodings.
This method computes and caches the cosine and sine values used in positional encodings based on the given sequence length, device, and data type. It calculates the inverse frequency for the positional encodings, applies a correction range, and registers the resulting cosine and sine values as buffers for efficient retrieval during model inference.
Args: seq_len (int): The length of the sequence for which to cache the cosine and sine values. device (torch.device): The device on which to store the tensors. dtype (torch.dtype): The data type of the tensors to be used.
Returns: None: This function does not return a value but modifies the internal state of the object by caching the computed values.
Reimplemented from modeling_deepseek.DeepseekV3RotaryEmbedding. Here is the caller graph for this function:
